abstracts.abstract: Nominates Ama O. Addai as Member of the Capital Development Board.

actions.description: ** Appointment Message Carried Over from Previous General Assembly **
Received by the Senate Sen. Laura M. Murphy;  on 10/11/2024
Assigned to Executive Appointments;  on 10/11/2024 - and on 01/07/2025, Due to Sine Die of the 103rd General Assembly
Placed on Calendar Order of Executive Appointments April 8, 2025
Pursuant to Senate Rule 10-1(c), move to compile the following AM's
